structure.unit: ARTICLE X. TRUTH IN LIVE ENTERTAINMENT

text.section:
Sec. 21-121. "Live entertainment per- formance" defined.
The following definition shall apply to the provisions of this article: "Live entertainment performance" as used herein shall mean any mercantile, on stage entertainment performance by living persons indoors or outdoors, including but not limited to, rock music festivals, concerts, night club shows, plays, dramatic presentations, recitals, dinner club shows, and musical entertainment of any type, but shall not include any athletic event.
